name: Clifford toolbox for Mathematica and Matlab

# Clifford Toolbox for Mathematica and Matlab

**Authors:**
* [Aragón-Camarasa, G.](https://github.com/gerac83)
* [Aragón-González, G.](https://scholar.google.co.uk/citations?user=kRY33gQAAAAJ&hl=en)
* [Aragon J. L.](http://www.fata.unam.mx/web/?q=node/6)
* [Rodriguez-Andrade, M. A.](https://scholar.google.co.uk/citations?user=lkR2_C0AAAAJ&hl=en)

## Introduction

The Clifford algebra of the vector space ![fig1](wiki/Intro_images/UserGuide_1.png), with a bilinear form `<x,y>` of signature `p, q`, and an orthonormal basis
![fig2](wiki/Intro_images/UserGuide_2.png), `i=1,2,...,n (=p+q)`, is generated by ![fig3](wiki/Intro_images/UserGuide_3.png) with the relation

![fig4](wiki/Intro_images/UserGuide_4.png)

where

![fig5](wiki/Intro_images/UserGuide_5.gif)

This software toolbox is a collection of functions for doing general calculations with Clifford Algebra (i.e. Geometric Algebra) of ![fig6](wiki/Intro_images/UserGuide_6.png), using _Mathematica 9.0_ or higher and _Matlab R2013a_ or higher. All results are given in terms of the orthonormal basis vectors ![fig7](wiki/Intro_images/UserGuide_7.png).
